new.name: CVE-2024-3094
new.description: CVE-2024-3094 exposed a backdoor in the XZ compression library, allowing remote SSH access by bypassing authentication. It‚Äôs a major supply chain attack affecting Linux systems, highlighting risks in trusted open-source components.

new.description: Lab project analyzing Hyper-V kernel crash behavior (CVE-2025-21333) using WinDbg and Windows internals.
